languages.text: "Вы — бич крамольников, несущий возмездие Его во имя праведных".

traits.locale_text: "Вы — бич крамольников, несущий возмездие Его во имя праведных".

languages.text: "You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His vengeance in the name of the righteous."
languages.original_text: "Вы — бич крамольников, несущий возмездие Его во имя праведных".

traits.locale_text: "You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His reckoning in the name of the righteous."
"You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His reckoning in the name of the righteous."
"You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His restitution in the name of the virtuous."
"You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His restitution in the name of the virtuous."
"You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His vengeance in the name of the righteous."
"You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His vengeance in the name of the righteous."

languages.text: «Son el azote de los renegados, instrumentos de Su venganza en nombre de los virtuosos».
languages.original_text: "You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His vengeance in the name of the righteous."

traits.locale_text: «Son el azote de los renegados, instrumentos de Su venganza en nombre de los virtuosos».

languages.text: 「お前は反逆者の災いだ。正義の名において、主の復讐を果たすがいい」
languages.original_text: "You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His vengeance in the name of the righteous."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は反逆者の災いだ。正義の名において、主の復讐を果たすがいい」

languages.text: “你们是叛乱分子的天敌，你们以义人的名义替祂行使正义。”
languages.original_text: "You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His vengeance in the name of the righteous."

traits.locale_text: “你们是叛乱分子的天敌，你们以义人的名义替祂行使正义。”

languages.text: "Ihr seid die Geißel der Abtrünnigen. Ihr übt Seine Rache im Namen der Rechtschaffenen."
languages.original_text: "You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His vengeance in the name of the righteous."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid die Geißel der Abtrünnigen. Ihr übt Seine Rache im Namen der Rechtschaffenen."

languages.text: « Vous êtes le fléau des renégats. Vous exécutez Sa vengeance au nom des justes. »
languages.original_text: "You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His vengeance in the name of the righteous."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes le fléau des renégats. Vous exécutez Sa vengeance au nom des justes. »

languages.text: "Hainlerin başına bela kesilirsiniz. Erdemlilerin adına O'nun intikamını yaşatırsınız."
languages.original_text: "You are the scourge of the renegades. You deliver His vengeance in the name of the righteous."
